Civ4GameText.TEXT:
AI_DIPLO_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_POWER_EQUAL_JUAREZ_1 Please support [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and it's people. We depend on your help!
<<<<<<< HEAD 请支持[OUR_CIV_SHORT]以及她的子民。我们依赖您的帮助！ ======= Please support [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and it's people. We depend on your help! >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_POWER_EQUAL_PEDRO_II This will be of mutual benefit for us both, don't you think so?
<<<<<<< HEAD 这对我们是公平互利的，难道您不这样认为吗？ ======= This will be of mutual benefit for us both, don't you think so? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: Hail and well met, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of the glorious [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. So tell me: does [CT_CIV_SHORT] have a lot of rich and unprotected coastal cities, or what?
TEXT.Chinese: Hail and well met, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of the glorious [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. So tell me: does [CT_CIV_SHORT] have a lot of rich and unprotected coastal cities, or what?

TEXT.English: Mighty [OUR_NAME], all-powerful god-king of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] welcomes you, [CT_NAME]! Feel free to grovel in terror and awe if the mood takes you.
TEXT.Chinese: Mighty [OUR_NAME], all-powerful god-king of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] welcomes you, [CT_NAME]! Feel free to grovel in terror and awe if the mood takes you.

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
AI_DIPLO_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_POWER_EQUAL_SAN_MARTIN Our armies are evenly matched, but I believe in a battle I would win out. So that this does not occur I ask you to meet our demands.
<<<<<<< HEAD 我们的军队已经整装待发，我认为如果现在开战我们将会取胜。当然，我还是更希望在谈判桌上，而不是战场上解决这个问题。 ======= Our armies are evenly matched, but I believe in a battle I would win out. So that this does not occur I ask you to meet our demands. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_POWER_STRONGER_JUAREZ_1 [OUR_CIV_SHORT] needs this and demands your assistance!
<<<<<<< HEAD [OUR_CIV_SHORT]需要它，请您帮助我们！ ======= [OUR_CIV_SHORT] needs this and demands your assistance! >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_POWER_STRONGER_PEDRO_II Brazil is strong in many ways, [CT_NAME]. Do not force me to show you how strong.
<<<<<<< HEAD 从很多方面来看，巴西都十分强大，[CT_NAME]，别指望我们会屈服于你的威势！ ======= Brazil is strong in many ways, [CT_NAME]. Do not force me to show you how strong. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_POWER_STRONGER_SAN_MARTIN You are outgunned and outclassed. I suggest you give me what I demand.
<<<<<<< HEAD 你们的军队已经完全落后于时代了，我建议你乖乖地把我们想要的东西交出来。 ======= You are outgunned and outclassed. I suggest you give me what I demand. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_POWER_WEAKER_JUAREZ_1 Can you spare this for the people of the [OUR_EMPIRE]?
<<<<<<< HEAD 你能为[OUR_EMPIRE]慷慨解囊么？ ======= Can you spare this for the people of the [OUR_EMPIRE]? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_POWER_WEAKER_PEDRO_II My people have faith in me, [CT_NAME]. Please help me not to disappoint them.
<<<<<<< HEAD 我肩负我国人民的重托，[CT_NAME]。请您不要让我使他们失望。 ======= My people have faith in me, [CT_NAME]. Please help me not to disappoint them. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_POWER_WEAKER_SAN_MARTIN The simplest strategy is for me to ask you for what we need and hope your good will wins out.
<<<<<<< HEAD 对我们来说，只要你能够一路获胜，我们就能得到我们所需要的东西。 ======= The simplest strategy is for me to ask you for what we need and hope your good will wins out. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_FIRST_CONTACT_GENERIC Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], leader of the great civilization of [OUR_CIV_SHORT].
<<<<<<< HEAD 您好，[CT_NAME]！我是[OUR_NAME]，强大的[OUR_CIV_SHORT]文明的领导者。 ======= Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], leader of the great civilization of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: Peace be upon you, [CT_NAME] of [CT_CIV_SHORT]. If you would expect the blessings of Allah, be kind to his people, for Allah will help him who moves the ways of Allah.
TEXT.Chinese: Peace be upon you, [CT_NAME] of [CT_CIV_SHORT]. If you would expect the blessings of Allah, be kind to his people, for Allah will help him who moves the ways of Allah.

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
AI_DIPLO_FIRST_CONTACT_LEADER_ATATURK_1 I am [OUR_NAME], the President of the Turkish people. We Turks do not consider our principles as dogmas contained in books that are said to come from heaven. We derive our inspiration not from heaven, or from an unseen world, but directly from life.
<<<<<<< HEAD 我就是[OUR_NAME]，土耳其人民的总统。我们土耳其人从不考虑那些上天带来的教条。我们获得的启示既不来源于上天，也不来源于那个看不见的时间，而是来源于生活。 ======= I am [OUR_NAME], the President of the Turkish people. We Turks do not consider our principles as dogmas contained in books that are said to come from heaven. We derive our inspiration not from heaven, or from an unseen world, but directly from life. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_FIRST_CONTACT_LEADER_CARDENAS_1 Hola. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I am convinced that the good intentions of a ruler are simply not enough and that the collective factor represented by the workers is indispensable. Don't you agree [CT_NAME]?
<<<<<<< HEAD 你好。我是[OUR_EMPIRE]的[OUR_NAME]。我深信，对于统治者来说，徒有善意是不够的。而工人阶级所代表的集体意志是不可或缺的。你不这么认为吗，[CT_NAME]？ ======= Hola. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I am convinced that the good intentions of a ruler are simply not enough and that the collective factor represented by the workers is indispensable. Don't you agree [CT_NAME]? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_FIRST_CONTACT_LEADER_CHARLES_1 Welcome [CT_NAME]. We would welcome friendship with you. Are you greedy of territory, or greedy of piece and quiet?
<<<<<<< HEAD 欢迎，[CT_NAME]。我们欢迎与你交朋友，你热爱于领土、和平与安宁么? ======= Welcome [CT_NAME]. We would welcome friendship with you. Are you greedy of territory, or greedy of piece and quiet? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_FIRST_CONTACT_LEADER_HAILE_SELASSIE_1 Greetings in the name of God, [CT_NAME] of [CT_CIV_SHORT]. We are Emperor [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. We know that material and spiritual progress are essential to man. Will you join us as we ceaselessly work for the equal attainment of both?
<<<<<<< HEAD 以上帝之名向您问候，[CT_CIV_SHORT]的[CT_NAME]。我们是[OUR_CIV_SHORT]的帝王[OUR_NAME]。我们知道，人类的物质文明与精神文明的进步是不可或缺的。你会加入我们，为了我们之间的平等关系而不断努力吗？ ======= Greetings in the name of God, [CT_NAME] of [CT_CIV_SHORT]. We are Emperor [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. We know that material and spiritual progress are essential to man. Will you join us as we ceaselessly work for the equal attainment of both? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_FIRST_CONTACT_LEADER_JUAREZ_1 Greetings, [CT_NAME]. My name is [OUR_NAME], and I am the president of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. My motto is: when there is respect, there is peace!
<<<<<<< HEAD 贵安，[CT_NAME]。我是[OUR_NAME]，[OUR_CIV_SHORT]的总统，我的座右铭是：尊重他人的权利就是和平！ ======= Greetings, [CT_NAME]. My name is [OUR_NAME], and I am the president of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. My motto is: when there is respect, there is peace! >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_FIRST_CONTACT_LEADER_KHOMEINI_1 I, [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV], greet you. Know that those who speak of nationalism, democracy, and such things want to take our nation away from its mission.
<<<<<<< HEAD 我，来自[OUR_CIV]的[OUR_NAME]向您问候。我知道，整天谈论着民族、民主什么的那些人想要让我们的国家远离正途。 ======= I, [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV], greet you. Know that those who speak of nationalism, democracy, and such things want to take our nation away from its mission. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME], Emperor of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Dedicating all my efforts to the well-being of my people, I shall guard the concept of Autocracy like all my forefathers did.
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME], Emperor of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Dedicating all my efforts to the well-being of my people, I shall guard the concept of Autocracy like all my forefathers did.

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
AI_DIPLO_FIRST_CONTACT_LEADER_PEDRO_II Welcome to humble [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. I am [OUR_NAME], leader of this far-reaching and ever progressing country. Tell me, who are you?
<<<<<<< HEAD 谦逊的[OUR_CIV_SHORT]欢迎你。我是[OUR_NAME]，领导着这影响深远且不断进步的国家。告诉我，你是谁？ ======= Welcome to humble [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. I am [OUR_NAME], leader of this far-reaching and ever progressing country. Tell me, who are you? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_FIRST_CONTACT_LEADER_SAN_MARTIN Hello, friend. My name is [OUR_NAME], but you can call me Jose. Or you can call me Francisco. Or you can call me Martin. Just don't call me late for dinner.
<<<<<<< HEAD 你好，我的朋友。我叫[OUR_NAME]，当然你可以叫我何塞，或者也可以叫我弗朗西斯科，再或者直接叫我马丁也行，就是千万别叫我留下来吃晚餐。 ======= Hello, friend. My name is [OUR_NAME], but you can call me Jose. Or you can call me Francisco. Or you can call me Martin. Just don't call me late for dinner. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: Hello, [CT_NAME]. I am General Santa Anna, Savior of Mexico! What have you come to offer me in tribute?
TEXT.Chinese: Hello, [CT_NAME]. I am General Santa Anna, Savior of Mexico! What have you come to offer me in tribute?

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
AI_DIPLO_FIRST_CONTACT_LEADER_TAIZONG_1 Greetings [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], emperor of all the lands below the heavens. With absolute power over numberless minions, do you dare hurt the divine ruler of mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT].
<<<<<<< HEAD 贵安，[CT_NAME]。朕，[OUR_NAME]，乃普天之共主。欲犯我大唐者，虽远必诛！ ======= Greetings [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], emperor of all the lands below the heavens. With absolute power over numberless minions, do you dare hurt the divine ruler of mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] greets you. I do not praise myself or my courage, but I praise God, for he protected me, a sinful man, from deadly dangers and created me capable of doing many human things.
TEXT.Chinese: [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] greets you. I do not praise myself or my courage, but I praise God, for he protected me, a sinful man, from deadly dangers and created me capable of doing many human things.

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
AI_DIPLO_GREETINGS_ATT_FR_LEADER_ATATURK_1 We must get ready to build up the friendship between our peoples. How does a people get prepared for such an endeavour? By strengthening the natural bridges that exist between us. Language is a bridge... Religon is a bridge... History is a bridge...
<<<<<<< HEAD 我们必须着手建立两国人民之间的友谊。如何让人民为此而奋斗？通过加强我们之间存在的天然桥梁。语言是一座桥梁……宗教是一座桥梁……历史是一座桥梁…… ======= We must get ready to build up the friendship between our peoples. How does a people get prepared for such an endeavour? By strengthening the natural bridges that exist between us. Language is a bridge... Religon is a bridge... History is a bridge... >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_GREETINGS_ATT_FR_LEADER_HAILE_SELASSIE_1 Welcome, [CT_NAME]. Imagination, devotion, perseverance, together with divine grace, will assure your success. What shall we discuss?
<<<<<<< HEAD 欢迎，[CT_NAME]。想象力、奉献精神、意志力、加上神的恩惠，将保证你的成功。我们该先讨论哪个？ ======= Welcome, [CT_NAME]. Imagination, devotion, perseverance, together with divine grace, will assure your success. What shall we discuss? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_GREETINGS_ATT_FR_LEADER_JUAREZ_1 Greetings, [CT_NAME]! It is so great to be at peace with you glorious nation!
<<<<<<< HEAD 您好，[CT_NAME]！这对于你祖国的和平时多么的有利啊！ ======= Greetings, [CT_NAME]! It is so great to be at peace with you glorious nation! >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_GREETINGS_ATT_FR_LEADER_PEDRO_II I see you have come to visit, [CT_NAME]. Tell me, what is it you wish to discuss.
<<<<<<< HEAD 我知道你来了，[CT_NAME]。告诉我，你想讨论些什么？ ======= I see you have come to visit, [CT_NAME]. Tell me, what is it you wish to discuss. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_GREETINGS_ATT_FR_LEADER_SAN_MARTIN Finally I get to talk to a worthy adversary. What can the [OUR_EMPIRE] do for you?
<<<<<<< HEAD 终于能和一个棋逢对手的人交谈了。我们的[OUR_EMPIRE]能为您做些什么吗？ ======= Finally I get to talk to a worthy adversary. What can the [OUR_EMPIRE] do for you? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_GREETINGS_ATT_FUR_LEADER_HAILE_SELASSIE_1 The world is well supplied with people who wish to rule and dominate others. People like you.
<<<<<<< HEAD 这个世界乐于为统治者与支配者提供服务。人们拥戴你。 ======= The world is well supplied with people who wish to rule and dominate others. People like you. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_GREETINGS_ATT_FUR_LEADER_JUAREZ_1 Oh, you again... What are you going to complain about?
<<<<<<< HEAD 哦，你又……你又想抱怨些什么？ ======= Oh, you again... What are you going to complain about? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_GREETINGS_ATT_FUR_LEADER_KHOMEINI_1 If one permits an infidel to continue in his role as a corrupter of the earth, the infidel's moral suffering will be all the worse. If one kills the infidel, and this stops him from perpetrating his misdeeds, his death will be a blessing to him.
<<<<<<< HEAD 如果一个人允许异教徒继续为非作歹，那么他的精神上将会受到极大的苦难。如果一个人杀死异教徒，那么他先前犯下的罪恶就能得到救赎，他的死将是对他的祝福。 ======= If one permits an infidel to continue in his role as a corrupter of the earth, the infidel's moral suffering will be all the worse. If one kills the infidel, and this stops him from perpetrating his misdeeds, his death will be a blessing to him. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: Treachery, cowardice and lies are everywhere - and your nation is no exception.
TEXT.Chinese: Treachery, cowardice and lies are everywhere - and your nation is no exception.

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
AI_DIPLO_GREETINGS_ATT_FUR_LEADER_PEDRO_II Speak fast [CT_CIV_ADJ]. I have enough on my schedule already.
<<<<<<< HEAD 长话短说， [CT_CIV_ADJ]。 我的日程表可是排得很紧的。 ======= Speak fast [CT_CIV_ADJ]. I have enough on my schedule already. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_GREETINGS_ATT_FUR_LEADER_SAN_MARTIN You lack the guile to trick me. Be warned I will not react well to deceit.
<<<<<<< HEAD 你那微不足道的狡猾并不足以欺骗我，我警告你，下次你再敢这样就等着好看吧！ ======= You lack the guile to trick me. Be warned I will not react well to deceit. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_NO_PEACE_LEADER_JUAREZ_1 The government of the [OUR_EMPIRE] will fulfill its duty to defend its independence, to repel foreign aggression, and accept the struggle to which it has been provoked!
<<<<<<< HEAD [OUR_EMPIRE]政府将履行其维护独立的职责以击退外国入侵，并且承诺政府会与挑衅势力相抗衡！ ======= The government of the [OUR_EMPIRE] will fulfill its duty to defend its independence, to repel foreign aggression, and accept the struggle to which it has been provoked! >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_NO_PEACE_LEADER_PEDRO_II No way! I shall punish you for your crimes against [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and its people!
<<<<<<< HEAD 没门！你将为你针对 [OUR_CIV_SHORT] 以及她的人民所犯下的罪恶而受到惩罚！ ======= No way! I shall punish you for your crimes against [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and its people! >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_NO_PEACE_LEADER_SAN_MARTIN I knew you would beg for peace eventually, but there will be no peace until you surrender.
<<<<<<< HEAD 我知道你终于要来乞求和平了，但是我是不会答应的――除非你投降！ ======= I knew you would beg for peace eventually, but there will be no peace until you surrender. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_REFUSE_TO_TALK_LEADER_JUAREZ_1 Get out of my office!
<<<<<<< HEAD 滚出我的办公室！ ======= Get out of my office! >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_REFUSE_TO_TALK_LEADER_PEDRO_II You make me sad, [CT_NAME]. Go away.
<<<<<<< HEAD 你让我很失望，[CT_NAME]。走开。 ======= You make me sad, [CT_NAME]. Go away. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

AI_DIPLO_REFUSE_TO_TALK_LEADER_SAN_MARTIN I will now use my cunning knowledge of tactics to ignore you.
<<<<<<< HEAD 我将用我平生所学的所有战术来躲开你。 ======= I will now use my cunning knowledge of tactics to ignore you. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: Your words are but the grunts of a diseased pig, [CT_NAME]. I do not hear them.
TEXT.Chinese: Your words are but the grunts of a diseased pig, [CT_NAME]. I do not hear them.

TEXT.English: Give me this, [CT_NAME] and perhaps our two nations can live in peace for a while longer.
TEXT.Chinese: Give me this, [CT_NAME] and perhaps our two nations can live in peace for a while longer.

TEXT.English: Hand this over, [CT_NAME], and I might let you continue to exist for a short while longer.
TEXT.Chinese: Hand this over, [CT_NAME], and I might let you continue to exist for a short while longer.

TEXT.English: Unlikely as it may seem, it appears that your puny civilization has something that we want. I suggest you hand it over quickly.
TEXT.Chinese: Unlikely as it may seem, it appears that your puny civilization has something that we want. I suggest you hand it over quickly.

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. And how is that undefended civilization of your coming along?
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. And how is that undefended civilization of your coming along?

TEXT.English: Not a chance. The mighty [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people do not care to make peace with cattle-stealing brigands like you.
TEXT.Chinese: Not a chance. The mighty [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people do not care to make peace with cattle-stealing brigands like you.

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people always enjoy meeting vulnerable and undefended new civilizations!
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people always enjoy meeting vulnerable and undefended new civilizations!

TEXT.English: So you have emerged from your fetid country and come to me, [CT_NAME]. To what do I owe this extremely dubious honor?
TEXT.Chinese: So you have emerged from your fetid country and come to me, [CT_NAME]. To what do I owe this extremely dubious honor?

TEXT.English: We require mighty [CT_CIV_SHORT]'s assistance. I hope you won't disappoint us.
TEXT.Chinese: We require mighty [CT_CIV_SHORT]'s assistance. I hope you won't disappoint us.

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
TXT_KEY_TRADE_DEFENSIVE_PACT A Mutual Protection Pact - Each Party Agrees to Automatically Declare War if the Other Party is Attacked.
<<<<<<< HEAD 共同防御协定――双方同意在对方遭到第三方攻击时自动向其宣战。 ======= A Mutual Protection Pact - Each Party Agrees to Automatically Declare War if the Other Party is Attacked. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TXT_KEY_TRADE_SLAVE Slave Trade
<<<<<<< HEAD 奴隶贸易 ======= Slave Trade >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: Good day and bonjour, to you [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people wish for peace, but insist that masters in our own house we must be.
TEXT.Chinese: Good day and bonjour, to you [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people wish for peace, but insist that masters in our own house we must be.

TEXT.English: Finally we meet [CT_NAME], I have been awaiting your arrival. I am Meiji of Japan. Come, we have much to discuss. You have very nice dress, and I am impressed by your armies. Please, show me your ways and I shall show you the wonders of Japan...
TEXT.Chinese: Finally we meet [CT_NAME], I have been awaiting your arrival. I am Meiji of Japan. Come, we have much to discuss. You have very nice dress, and I am impressed by your armies. Please, show me your ways and I shall show you the wonders of Japan...

TEXT.English: Welcome to the independent [OUR_CIV_ADJ] lands! I am the king [OUR_NAME], will [CT_CIV_SHORT] recognize [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s independence or do I need to convince you with my armies?
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome to the independent [OUR_CIV_ADJ] lands! I am the king [OUR_NAME], will [CT_CIV_SHORT] recognize [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s independence or do I need to convince you with my armies?

TEXT.English: Here comes my best friend, [CT_NAME]! What brings you today to [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?
TEXT.Chinese: Here comes my best friend, [CT_NAME]! What brings you today to [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?

TEXT.English: You are an enemy of [OUR_CIV_SHORT], but I will talk to you.
TEXT.Chinese: You are an enemy of [OUR_CIV_SHORT], but I will talk to you.

TEXT.English: We desperatedly demand your assistance, [CT_NAME]! [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s future depends on you!
TEXT.Chinese: We desperatedly demand your assistance, [CT_NAME]! [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s future depends on you!

TEXT.English: Any chance you share your wealth with [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?
TEXT.Chinese: Any chance you share your wealth with [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?

TEXT.English: Recognizing me as king of the [OUR_EMPIRE] is not enough! I demand the following in tribute!
TEXT.Chinese: Recognizing me as king of the [OUR_EMPIRE] is not enough! I demand the following in tribute!
